name: Clockwork Bronze Scout
languages: understands one language of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Earth Armor
entries: The clockwork doesn't provoke {@action opportunity attack||opportunity attacks} when it burrows.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The clockwork has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The clockwork doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3 damage) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6 damage) lightning damage.

actions.name: Lightning Flare (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Each creature in contact with the ground within 15 feet of the clockwork must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 (4d6 damage) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
